degeneration
Class GeneticCode

java.lang.Object
  degeneration.GeneticCode

public class GeneticCode
extends java.lang.Object

This class represents a Genetic Code. Is a table linking amino acids to nucleotide triplets

Version:
1.1.3
Author:
Javier Iserte

GeneticCode

public GeneticCode(java.lang.String pathfile)
Creates a new instance of genetic Code. From a path file where a genetic code is stored.

Method Detail

getRetroCodon

public java.lang.String getRetroCodon(java.lang.String amino)
This method returns a string representing an codon from a string representing a amino acid. An Amino acid can be coded by more than one codon. In this case all possible codons are pile up into one codon and this is returned.

Parameters:
amino - One of the 20 standard amino acid represented in one letter uppercase form.
Returns:
String a triplet representing a codon.

getCodonArray

public java.util.List<java.lang.String> getCodonArray(java.lang.String amino)
Returns an array with all the codons that codifies for a particular amino acid.

Parameters:
amino - One of the 20 standard amino acid represented in one letter uppercase form.
Returns:
a list of triplets, each one representing a codon.

translate

public java.lang.String translate(java.lang.String codon)
Translate a single codon into an amino acid. The codon must be formed with non degenerated bases.

Parameters:
codon - String that represents a codon.
Returns:
String One of the 20 standard amino acid represented in one letter uppercase form.

apilar

public java.lang.String apilar(java.lang.String DNAseq1,
                               java.lang.String DNAseq2)
Piles Up two DNA sequences and returns it. Preconditions: DNAseq1 y DNAseq2 Have the same length DNAseq1 y DNAseq2 are upper case strings. DNAseq1 y DNAseq2 are formed by IUPAC degenerated code.

Parameters:
DNAseq1 - String input DNAseq
DNAseq2 - String input DNAseq
Returns:
String representing the sequence of piling up the two sequences.

calculateDegValue

public int calculateDegValue(java.lang.String base)
Calculates the degeneration value for a particular base.

Parameters:
base - string a degenerated base
Returns:
int value from 0 to 4.

calculateDegValue

public int calculateDegValue(char base)
Calculates the degeneration value for a particular base.

Parameters:
base - string a degenerated base
Returns:
int value from 0 to 4.

readTableFromFile

private void readTableFromFile(java.lang.String pathfile)
Reads a genetic code from a file. The file must have the next format: One line is used by amino acid and one more is used for stop signal (represented by '*'). Each line starts with the amino acid written in one letter code. Followed by the codons that can codifies the amino acid. Each element is separated bye a comma ','.
Example for a line:
"A, ATC, GGT, TTT, AAA, CAC"

Parameters:
pathfile - String with the path to the file containing the genetic code.
